title: High-Yield Summary Table of Herpesviruses
content:
High-Yield Summary Table of Herpesviruses

Virus Primary Infection Latency Site Reactivation Disease Diagnosis Treatment Vaccine
HSV-1 Oral herpes, gingivostomatitis, keratitis, encephalitis Trigeminal ganglia Cold sores, herpes encephalitis PCR, Tzanck smear (multinucleated giant cells) Acyclovir, Valacyclovir, Famciclovir ❌
HSV-2 Genital herpes, neonatal herpes, HSV meningitis Sacral ganglia Genital herpes recurrence PCR, Tzanck smear Acyclovir, Valacyclovir, Famciclovir ❌
VZV Chickenpox (varicella) Dorsal root ganglia Shingles (herpes zoster), postherpetic neuralgia PCR, Tzanck smear Acyclovir, Valacyclovir, Famciclovir ✔ (Varicella & Zoster vaccines)
EBV Infectious mononucleosis Memory B cells Burkitt lymphoma, Hodgkin lymphoma, oral hairy leukoplakia Monospot test, atypical lymphocytes Supportive (no acyclovir use) ❌
CMV Congenital CMV, mononucleosis-like syndrome, pneumonia in immunocompromised Monocytes, bone marrow Retinitis, colitis, esophagitis (AIDS), pneumonia (transplant patients) PCR, "Owl's eye" inclusions Ganciclovir, Foscarnet ❌
HHV-6 & HHV-7 Roseola (exanthem subitum) T cells Febrile seizures in infants PCR Supportive ❌
HHV-8 Kaposi sarcoma (AIDS patients) B cells Kaposi sarcoma recurrence PCR, biopsy ART (HIV patients), chemotherapy ❌
